page.title: 12A Rugby League Star.
page.content: My dad is a car salesman. He is also a pofessional rugby league player. He plays centre for Carlisle. The greatest moment of his career was when he won the BBC 2 Floodlit Final for Hull against Widnes in 1979. His worst moment was when he had a severe leg injury 48 hours before the Rugby League Cup Final at Wembley in 1982, resulting in him being unable to play and being unable to fulfil his lifetimes ambition. As a youngster he played for Normanton and represented Yorkshire. He became a proffessional at 17 for Huddersfield. To keep fit he has to train hard by sprinting, road running and circuit training. He hopes to keep playing for as long as the game gives him enjoyment.
